author: rahulr311295
body:
Powershell needed a dependency called libcurl3 so i tried to manually install It which led to removing most of my pre-installed tools like curl metasploit etc,

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/21986177/41195004-e610193e-6c42-11e8-86f7-f14f9621173d.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/21986177/41195001-c84fb0f8-6c42-11e8-93e3-8c13f8232aa8.png)

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: @rahulr311295 .Net 2.0 has curl dependency not PowerShell Core. Currently we already moved to .Net Core 2.1 which haven't the dependency. You can test this with latest PowerShell Core builds or wait Preview3.

title: Installing libcurl3 led to losing half of the tools installed
